Articles.Content:
Hi

I have problem - its just start to happen.

When I selecting parts at VAB, at left side, I need to press couple or more times to select part... I had such issue maybe year ago... but do not remember how I fixed it (or if fixed at all).

Think somebody might have same issue.. with parts selection? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I just started having the same problem tonight after loading the following mods: Ven's Revamp, B Dynamic Parts, Adjustable Landing Gear, Intake Build Aid, Mk2 Expansion, KIS, KAS, Atomic Rockets, Porkjet's Habitat, and Stock Fuel Switcher. And the newest Hyperedit. I suspect one of them is the culprit, but I could be wrong. Any of those recently installed by you?

**Kerbal Inventory System (KIS)**

for sure that this mod.... same I just installed and have such issues. no other mods I have which you have.

I left GitHub issue threat in KIS project site - [https://github.com/KospY/KIS/issues/51](https://github.com/KospY/KIS/issues/51)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T10:11:53Z" title="05/15/2015 10:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by heresim**

Hmm... KIS is an extremely popular mod. If it was KIS (and not some other mod, or an bad interaction between two or more mods), wouldn't more people be having problems? I was planning to experiment tonight after work with a clean install and adding mods back one at a time to figure it out. Did you try to remove KIS (assuming version 1.1.4) to see if the problem went away?
After reinstalling my mods, the problem has disappeared. At least so far...
I think we found fix. Thread can be closed!
